document_data.name: Choose Future
document_data.mainbody: '''''Choose future''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[divination]] [[spell]] from the [[time sphere]] that granted the target the best outcome for a situation.
document_data.Effects: The target of this spell was allowed to perform a single act twice and pick whichever act had the more desirable outcome. The chosen act would then become reality.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s two grains of [[sand]] and a [[rose]] petal to cast.
document_data.History: The ''[[Tome of Torment]]'', a holy book of the [[Church of Ilmater]], contained the spell ''choose future''.
